songs.title: They want me back in (feat. big rich)
songs.lyrics:
[Ice-T]
Yeah, sh*t is going down again!
This motherf**kers want me back in! f**k!
[Method Man: Word up, our niggas is strapped, ready for war!] [4x]
Get out the H-K!
F**k!
Niggas talking crazy cause they say
That I kill one-a-day motherf**ker
Sucker ass busters, did he, did not
I got more drama with the niggas from the other side
Call my nigga Rich and he's right!
[Big Rich]
F**k them niggas I got a truck full of 38, some bullet shields
Ice, we can send this niggas all to Hell
I never like them niggas from the gat
Go use to braken my cr*ps and f**k all the motherf**kin hoes!
[Ice-T]
Made another car-hit 30 Killers on the hip
Ready to rock, packin, eggin and Glocks
Man connections who trips the question
Niggas on the way to play in a laser rain
[Big Rich]
Nigga you got two strikes and I got two strikes
We can feudally no f**kin witness tonight
But if this is what they want is like Christmas to me
It's been a long time since the Big Rich caught a body
[Ice-T]
F**k it, I Like the way you think my man
I pack 20 motherf**kers in a ??? van
We bash abd creeo about 12:30, dirty
Nigga be ready to roll, I know you heard me!
[Big Rich]
Nigga it's on, so don't trip I'm down
I got to saw ??? and I'm ready to claw
Bless the nigga in the Face kill his f**kin hoe
Ice, you don't did this kind of sh*t with me before!
[Method Man: Word up, our niggas is strapped, ready for war!] [8x]
They want me back in!
Niggas want me back in!
They want me back in!
Damn!
[Ice-T]
Niggas wanne ill, but my nigga get iller
Streets full of hardcore stone-face Killers
One Love my nigga Big Rich puff
I don't get high, I wanne see some niggas die!
[Big Rich]
Yo, some niggas hit the corner with the lights of Ice
That sh*t don't look nuthin nice
But if this niggas wanne rollin my Hood
Yo then f**k it, brake out the whole World, boys f**kin buck it
[Ice-T]
Niggas pulled out my crew is ready
Me turn the fire rock the punks steady
When they shoot and stop car look like confetti
Went my ass home jump back in the bed G
[Big Rich]
F**k why they wanna f**k with us
When they know my posse is crazy and they down to bust
Big Rich take no sh*t from these busta ass tricks
Check your punk ass nigga like check a b**ch
[Ice-T]
I got no love for no nigga flippin, trippin on my fam
Got damn, I make L.A. hot as Vietnam
But ill niggas should be left alone
Please excuse me, while I rest my dome!
[Method Man: Word up, our niggas is strapped, ready for war!] [8x]
They want me back in
Niggas want me back in
They want me back in
Why......niggas want me back in?
